title: Tour de France newsletter with Zwift
content:
Following the success of our daily Giro d'Italia bulletins, we have teamed up with Zwift to bring you all the talking points from Le Tour, delivered to your inbox every morning.

Start the day the informed way, with predictions, talking points, historical snippets and updates from the Rouleur Fantasy League – there's still time to join, it's free, and there's a Zwift subscription and more to be won.

If you’re already a Chronicle subscriber, you’ll receive our daily Tour de France newsletter, otherwise please sign up below.
author: Miles Baker-Clarke
